text: The 2018 BOSS GP season is the 24th season of the BOSS GP series. The championship begins on 22 April at Hockenheim and finishes on 14 October at Paul Ricard. ==Teams and Drivers== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%;" |- ! Team ! Chassis ! Engine ! No. !
